OOC: Isn't the limit 2?

BIC: The 4 missiles explode on Radistor and he get=
s a good look at the robot. Hot Rod? The Radicons start discussing with eac=
h other over the main computer.

Airbomber: He's a Maximal.

Train Wreck: I=
 know, why are the Maximals attacking us?

Stranato: Yeah, we never did any=
thing to them.

Stronghold: Who the hell do they think they are?

Stranato:=
 I'll tell him.

Radistor: Maximal Hot Rod, I am Maximal gestalt Radistor, =
good to meet you, I apologize for firing at you earlier, I had no idea you =
were a Maximal...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: RoboRick007 
  T=
o: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, July 14, 2001 11:36 PM
  Subje=
ct: Re: Clash


  ::Hot Rod/Cleder/Rixer/Forrior/Blyer/Firearm::

  The Max=
imals wat as Radistor retreats, but they all notice it is in the
  wrong di=
rection. The all wounder where he is going. It is Hot Rod who
  figures it =
out.
  "Oh no! Guys, he is heading towards Maximal City!"
  Cleder opens hi=
s commlink to all bots at Maxial City.
  "This is Cleder at the Chiviton ba=
se. The gestalt, Radistor, is heading
  towards Maximal City. Be on full al=
ert! Hot Rod, my self, and the other
  will try to slow him down."

  They =
all head after him shooting, although their weapons had not had
  much effe=
ct during the battle. Hot Rod transformes to sports car mode,
  and drives =
ahead of Radistor. He shoots four missiles back at the
  gestalt.

=
